get_password: select password_hash from users_login where email_hash = ?
get_id: select id from users_login where email_hash = ?
get_id_by_slug: select id from users_main where slug = ?
get_slug_by_id: select slug from users_main where id = ?
get_slug: select slug from users_main where id = ?
create_user_login: insert into users_login (id, email_hash, password_hash) values (?, ?, ?)
update_personal: INSERT INTO users_personal (id, name, fav_animal) VALUES (?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), fav_animal = VALUES(fav_animal), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
get_personal: select name, fav_animal from users_personal where id = ?
add_image: INSERT INTO users_images (user_id, url, animal) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
get_user_images: select url, animal from users_images where user_id = ?
in_request: SELECT * FROM friend_requests WHERE user_id = ? AND friend_id = ?
my_requests: select user_id from friend_requests where friend_id = ?
remove_request: DELETE FROM friend_requests WHERE user_id = ? AND friend_id = ?
are_friends: SELECT 1 FROM friends WHERE (user_id = ? AND friend_id = ?)  OR (user_id = ? AND friend_id = ?)
get_friends: SELECT CASE  WHEN user_id = ? THEN friend_id ELSE user_id END AS friend_id FROM friends WHERE user_id = ? OR friend_id = ?
get_hats: select hat_id from hats_ownership where user_id = ?
get_avatars: select avatar_id from avatars_ownership where user_id = ?
get_money: select balance from users_coins where id = ?
decrease_money: INSERT INTO users_coins (id, balance) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE balance = VALUES(balance);
get_price_hat: select price from hats where hat_id = ?
get_price_avatar: select price from avatars where avatar_id = ?
get_earned: select balance from users_coins_earned where id = ?
update_earned: INSERT INTO users_coins_earned (id, balance) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE balance = VALUES(balance);
update_hat: INSERT INTO currents (id, hat_id) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE hat_id = VALUES(hat_id);
update_avatar: INSERT INTO currents (id, avatar_id) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE avatar_id = VALUES(avatar_id);
